channel.title: Error with server, looking for help please
channel.description:
Hi, I've been heving a lot of trouble with myb server sinc.e. well since I started it 3 days ago. :P
First my crown wouldnt show, and when I fixed that I got an even bigger error, now I need HELP
Whenever I log on to my server it boots me off. The message in the java console thing when I run my server is as follows:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "2"
at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ObjectHandler.loadobjects(ObjectHandler.java: 48) at ObjectHandler.<init>(ObjectHandler.java: 48) at server.main(server.java: 33)
I have no idea, to be honest. I can tell from that that its probably something in Object handler, but I'm unsure where.. does the ObjectHandler.java: 48 mean something like,the 48th line in ObjectHandler.java?
And same with Server.java, line 33?
I dont wanna go rummaging through the code for hours on end so if anybody could tell me where I've gone wrong, I would appreciate it.
Thanks
Wetton.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 14, 2008, 12:50:21 PM[/size][hr]BUMP!
Still need help, please
Thank you kindly :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 14, 2008, 01:17:45 PM[/size][hr]HELLO?

item.title: Error with server, looking for help please
item.dc:creator: @uber_leet uber leet
item.description:
@uber_leet wrote:

Hi, I’ve been heving a lot of trouble with myb server sinc.e. well since I started it 3 days ago.

First my crown wouldnt show, and when I fixed that I got an even bigger error, now I need HELP

Whenever I log on to my server it boots me off. The message in the java console thing when I run my server is as follows:

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: “2”

        at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
        at java lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
        at ObjectHandler.loadobjects(ObjectHandler.java: 48)
        at ObjectHandler.<init>(ObjectHandler.java: 48)
        at server.main(server.java: 33)

I have no idea, to be honest. I can tell from that that its probably something in Object handler, but I’m unsure where… does the ObjectHandler.java: 48 mean something like,the 48th line in ObjectHandler.java?

And same with Server.java, line 33?

I dont wanna go rummaging through the code for hours on end so if anybody could tell me where I’ve gone wrong, I would appreciate it.

Thanks

Wetton.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 14, 2008, 12:50:21 PM[/size][hr]BUMP!

Still need help, please

Thank you kindly :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 14, 2008, 01:17:45 PM[/size][hr]HELLO?

Read full topic
